name: appcuisine GmbH
tagline: Build delicious apps for your mobile challenges.
description:
The appcuisine employees can not only look back on more than 16 years of experience in IT, but have also developed the first iPad App in the German Pharma Sales Force. Since then, we have supported several DAX corporations in the implementation of iPad solutions in sales.
Through our many years of experience with web projects, we can not only provide the necessary backend services for mobile applications, but also implement complex web projects.
